channel.title: Menus
channel.description: How do you guys make several menus!? i already have ::help, but now i want ::commands ::rules and some more, anyone know how!?

item.title: Menus
item.dc:creator: @justanoob justanoob
item.description:
@justanoob wrote:

If you can tell when the string ends just copy and paste the help command in client.jave you already have and paste it right bellow it. To find the help command search for 'help". Then change the “help” to “commands” or “rules” then change the text to what you want it to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Menus
item.dc:creator: @sriyegna sriyegna
item.description:
@sriyegna wrote:

hmm, but i cant find public void commands…

Read full topic

item.title: Menus
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Alright this is how you do it…

Open up client.java

Search for:

public void help();

Copy and paste the whole void and Change:

public void help();

To

public void commands();

and then change the stuff under it so it gives a list of commands…

There u go.

Congratz you can now make more menus

To make a command do:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { commands(); }

Read full topic
